Before I knew it, it was time for me to head off for school. On the way out, I grabbed a pair of aviator sunglasses and went to go find my friend Steve. The two of us met when his mom needed someone to watch over him last minute and sense we were a few doors down the road and had all the child proofing done as well sense I was born a few weeks before him. Needless to say, we've been near inseparable sense then. As I approached Steve's house, I saw her sitting on the front porch. "Steve" I called out.

Her head shot up and her long blonde hair went everywhere. "John, is that you" she said while standing up.

"In the flesh"

"Dang, you look smokin hot as a girl"

"Could have been worse"

"How so?"

"I could have become a dumb blonde like you"

"Thanks a lot bud"

"Shut up. Come on, we need to get going or we'll be late"

After walking for about five minutes, and with the school in sight, Steve looked at me and asked "So, do you have any plans tonight or are you free for some serious call of duty ?"

"As much as I wanna join you, I have hockey practice tonight"

"Are you serious?" She asked. "The whole world changes genders on Saturday and you still have practice on Monday?"

"It's optional" I informed him. "And I'm optioning to go"

"Whatever"

Five minutes later, we were walking into the school. Nothing about the building had changed. Why would it. It was everyone in the building that made it feel different. Everyone was quite. Some were talking to who I would guess we're really close friends, but for the most part everyone was quietly going about their lives and from what I could tell feeling insecure because of the changes that they encountered. Steve and I quickly worked our way to our first class of the day, English 11. We managed to just barley make it to class on time, walking in just seconds before the bell went off.

"Alright right everyone, let's all just settle down and take our seats" the teacher said. I had to admit, she looked different as a guy than I'd have expected. He was nothing to write home about, just different is all. But I hadn't thought much about what other people would look like really. "I need for everyone to make up a name tag for themselves and then pull out their iPads and log onto the schools website"

"What for?" A girl in the back of the class asked.

"Well, the name tag is so I can re-learn all your faces"

"No, why do we need to go on the schools web page?"

"Well, the administration worked all day yesterday and up until the school doors opened today so you could replace the photo on file with one of you with your new gender"

The whole class did as he said. After about 15 minutes, the whole class had finished updating their school files. The teacher got onto his lesson, and it proved to be yet another boring day in English class. The same held true for the rest of my core classes. It was kinda funny, being able to see what some people turned out to be as the opposite gender. Like, the captain of former boys basketball team (who was super popular with all the girls because of his looks) could best be described as a rather average looking girl. Once I started to get to my elective classes, the day got more interesting as it usually did. My weight lifting class was frustrating because I had lost so much of my muscle mass and couldn't lift as much. I think I topped out at 80 pounds. But there were other guys turned girls who could barely lift the bar, so I considered myself lucky.

The second class was over, I went and found Steve. Together, the two of us made our way to the schools hockey rink, which was a short walk from the school itself. I still had two and a half hours until our optional practice, but I just wanted to get there early so I could get used to some things. Once Steve left I changed into my team set of off-ice workout gear which was now a green and yellow camo sports bra, a green form fitting long sleeved shirt with the school logo and my number on the chest, and a pair of yellow running shorts. After doing about an hour and a few off-ice drills later (which I did to kill time more than anything) I started to get my equipment on. For the most part it was all the same, maybe just a bit smaller.

I sat alone in the locker room for about 15 or 20 minutes with the bottom half of my gear on, just thinking. After a while my teammates started showing up one by one. We laughed and joked like we always did. The actual practice was relatively simple. A bunch of skating drills for all the forwards and defenseman, and a bunch of goalie specific skating drills for the goalies (like me). But for the last 15 minutes or so, we broke up into two teams and played 4 on 4 with full ice. I, personally, loved it when we did this and made sure to throw a few witty comments at my teammates who were not currently on my team ( http://cdn3.sportngin.com/attachments/ph... ). Once we were done, we all quickly changed out of our gear and headed home because most of us still had homework to do.
11123222221112.title: Waking up for school

111232222221.content:
Ok, one last high schooler option. You will be Mike Brown. Your 17 years old, 6 feet 1 inch tall, weigh 175lbs. You have brown hair, and blue eyes. You are in the high school band, and on the schools ice hockey and lacrosse teams.

You have a girlfriend. She's a pretty average hight, weight, and breast size for a high school girl. She has brown hair that comes down to her shoulders, blue eyes, and wears glasses. She plays the violin in the schools orchestra.

Your best friend is named Curtis. He's maybe 5 feet 11 inches and 170lbs. He's one of your bands drum majors, as well as the lacrosse teams starting goalie. He used to play hockey, where he was a defenseman, until he decided he'd have a better chance at a college scholarship if he focused on just lacrosse.

Back to Mike. Your about the middle of the social ladder. In band, you are the trombone section leader. In ice hockey, your the teams starting goaltender. In lacrosse, you play defense.

So, is this a good story line, or do you still want something else?
111232222221.title: Ok, fine

1112322222211.content:
The day started off like any other Friday had my whole life, and it was no different from any Friday this whole school year. I got up, got dressed, ate breakfast, packed my backpack and left for school. But then it happened. I was just starting my 2nd hour English class, not really paying attention to anyone or anything. Just kinda sitting there with nothing on my mind, waiting for the day to be over, listening to the rain hit the roof of the building more than my teacher. It was the last home football game of the year, but there was still a few weeks left in the season. Possibly the last time I'd have to march in front of a crowd of students that didn't pay attention to our halftime show. I didn't know it at the time, but this football game was going to be delayed for a few weeks.

Now, they call what happened the gender wave. It caused a lot of panic and confusion for about a day or so before somehow people started accepting that this happened and moved on with their lives. For a while, ID's were pointless. People have named themselves vastly different names, but for the most part their middle names were their original names so people could still hang onto something from before the wave. One thing that was really different was the world of sports. While some sports remained male dominate like football, other sports had both male and female leagues. There was still typical leagues like the NBA and WNBA or MLB or NHL. But new leagues like the MLSB (Major League Softball) or the NWHL (National Women's Hockey League) were created so males turned females could still play pro sports while the females turned males took the spots in the old leagues.

Anyway, like i said nobody was excluded. One minute I'm feeling fine thinking it's just a normal Friday and the next I feel a funny tingling go all over my body and I blacked out for a minute. When I come to, I have long, strait, brown hair going down to my shoulder blades. Looking down, I had 2 good sized breasts (I'd later learn they were C cups) contained in a navy blue vest and an orange scarf. I peered down it and saw I was wearing a tight, plane white, long sleeved girls teeshirt. Looking past the new additions on my upper body, I looked down to see I had on a pair of light blue girls skinny jeans on my legs, which weren't the skinniest I've seen I'm my life but we're definitely skinnier than I would have worn, and a pair of ballet flats on my feet ( http://cdn.iowagirleats.com/wp-content/u... ).

Looking away from myself, I looked around the room. Everybody in the room had changed like me. And everyone looked like themselves had they been born the opposite gender. "Guess it's safe to assume that happened to me" I whispered to myself so nobody could hear me. Looking down by my feet (and ballet flats that five minutes ago didn't belong to me) I spotted my blue and grey Vaughn backpack, and a brown purse lying next to it. I was about to get my stuff when a voice came over the intercom.

"Students and staff pardon the interruption but this is Principle Brown speaking. It would seem that we were just hit by something being called the gender wave. I understand that you may or may not be confused at this moment so we are going to be canceling all classes for the rest of today and Monday, with the possibility of Tuesday as well. I just ask that as you all leave the building you do so in a calm and orderly fashion. That is all"

Hearing that, I carefully stood up and put my backpack on my shoulders. I looked at the purse at my feet for a moment before placing it over my head so it hung by my waist (I'd seen my girlfriend carry her purse like this). Then, before I started walking for the door, I searched for my phone (finding it I'm my new purse), and texted my girlfriend asking to meet at my car. Now that I think about it, I was her ride home so she would have to meet me there if she wanted to get home. As I walked outside, I remembered that I had a pair of sunglasses on top of my head before this all happened. I pulled them off my head to see they to had changed. But sense it was sunny out right now, I placed them on my face.

Finding my car in the student parking lot, I was glad to see it hadn't changed to much. But for one thing, it was certainly cleaner. When my girlfriend (well I guess boyfriend now) arrived at my car, I was amazed by what she (he) looked like. Approaching me was a teenage boy with short dark brown hair, blue eyes, was around 6'0" and 160lbs. He had on all guy versions of what my girlfriend had been wearing this morning. Looking at him, I realized he was a tad bit taller, but only by 2 or 3 inches.

"Mike, is that you?" he asked.

"Taylor?" I asked.

"Well, yea" he answered. "Wow you look so different than I imagined"

"I can say the same to you. We need to get out of here"

"Right" he said.

We drove for a short period of time before arriving at my house. Taylor lived two doors down so we decided we'd just hang here for a while before he headed home. Walking through the door, Taylor asked "So, what are you gonna call yourself"

"What do you mean" I asked.

"Well if were stuck like this, you'll need a girls name. And Michael isn't very feminine" he said. As I thought about it, he had a good point.

"I guess your right" I started, "how about Michelle?"

"I like it" he said as he pulled me in close to him with his hands around my waist like I used to do when he was MY girlfriend, and kissed me. I didn't push away or anything, but I did kinda like it.

We watched the news for a bit, but that was no help what so ever. Eventually Taylor decided he just head home and see how it had changed. I decided that I might as well bite the bullet and check out my room sense the house as a whole was relatively unchanged.

To my amazement, even my room was mostly unchanged. The blankets and pillows had went from black to white, but the walls were still the same grey color.

The big change was my closet. It had gone from having all male clothes in it to having all female clothes like the male equivalent. The biggest change in clothing was my dress shirts had become fancy dresses and my dress pants, being the unlucky ducks so to speak, all became my new skirts from what I could tell. One huge change was the number of shoes I now owned. There had to be at least 35 pairs of shoes on the floor of my closet, compared to the 4 pairs I had as a guy. They ranged from a few flip flops to a few athletic shoes, to some high heels with what I would guess be a 4 inch heel at the tallest, to mostly a wide range of different flats. I took off the ballet shoes I was still wearing and placed them on the floor with the rest of my new shoes.

I spotted a full length mirror behind my door. Looking at the girl in the mirror, I saw she was around 5 feet 8 inches tall, 140lbs, and extremely attractive. But somehow, I wasn't attracted to her right now. Taking the sweatshirt and teeshirt off, I looked at the tag inside my new bra and saw I was right earlier when I guessed I was a C cup. I sat on the bed and looked at my feet, finding my toenails were painted a shade of dark pink. I hadn't noticed before, but my fingernails were the same shade.

Suddenly, I heard a noise downstairs. I quickly put the socks and shirt back on and left my room, heading downstairs to investigate. I ended up finding a strange man standing in our living room. He was about 6'4", 200lbs. with short, dark brown hair and green eyes. "Excuse me" I started. "Who are you"

"My name is Danielle Brown" he answered, then asked "Who are you"

"I'm Michelle Brown, but I used to be Mike" I answered.

"Mike" he said running to give me a hug.

"Mom" I said returning the hug.

"I think it's going to be dad for a while" he said with a smile. "And why did you introduce yourself as Michelle?"

"Taylor said I needed a girls name and that was the first to come to mind. When's da, I mean, mom going to be home?"

"Your mother" my new father started, "will be home soon. She needed to go help a friend with a panicky child"

"Oh, I see" I replied. I was kinda curious to see my new mom.

"So" dad said releasing me from the hug, "sense you've already got a new name I guess I need one two. How about Dan"

"Not very original" I said. "But it suits you. You look like a Dan"

"Thanks sweetie" he said, kissing me on the forehead. "Well it seems you've got some of my hight"

"What do you mean?" I asked.

"Your, um, mother is all of 5 feet 7 inches in her heels that make her 2 inches taller" he said laughing.

"Your joking" I asked.

"Nope, I kid you not" he replied.

"Oh, my, god" I said, laughing a tad bit.
1112322222211.title: Go with this

11123222222111.content:
Meeting my new mom wasn't as much fun as I thought I'd be, being that she (my former dad) was in the same predicament as I was. The night passed rather uneventfully actually. We had some dinner while watching the news for any information on what had happened. Around 7:30, I ended up just going and playing some call of duty on my Xbox 360. I quickly realized that my new, longer, fingernails were going to cause some problems, so I quickly cut them. If I had to be stuck as a girl for a long period of time, I would be as tomboyish as my new wardrobe would let me.

I eventually started getting tired and went to sleep around 10:00. Considering everything that had happened to me today, I slept like a log.

I dreamt about being a boy again, and none of this had happened. Then in a flash, everyone switched genders, like what happened today. But, I was the only person freaking out. My dad turned mom was wearing a dress, heels, makeup, and she expected me to do the same. That she expected me to dress like a woman should. When I told her I wasn't ready yet and still wanted to dress in jeans and a teeshirt, she got angry and started lecturing me about how appearance is everything. By the time she finished I felt a major rush of wind go right past me and when I looked down, I was wearing a black dress that went down to my knees, a jean jacket, and black boots. Around my neck was a grey scarf ( http://www.pinterest.com/pin/33502565975... ). On my wrist was several silver bracelets, and I could feel my ears were now pierced. I could also feel that my face was covered in makeup, and my hair was now in a very different style.

"There" my new mother said. "That's better"

With that I woke up, breathing heavily as I tried to calm down. Once I began breathing more normal like, I began to cry. Not very loud, but apparently loud enough. I had only been crying for a few seconds when my door opened and my dad turned mom said "you ok sweetie?"

Trying to stop crying, I said "yeah, I'm fine. What are you doing up right now?"

"Oh, I just couldn't sleep. I had a bad dream"

"You to?" I asked. "What about?"

"Nothing to much, I just went to work in my dream wearing some basic women's work clothes, but with pants and flats on. Then my boss stopped by my office and said I wasn't wearing the right clothing. I felt a rush of wind and the next thing I knew I was in an extremely feminine skirt suit with like 3 inch high heels on. What about you?"

"More or less the same. But you were forcing me to wear a dress to school" I said.

"Don't worry sweetie, I'll never do that to you. You can be whatever type of person you want to be" she said, sitting down on my bed with me, putting an arm on my shoulders.

"Thanks" I said.

We sat there for a few minutes in silence, before my dad turned mom got up to go back to bed. Once she left I sat there in silence, in the dark, for another minute. Eventually, I fell asleep and slept soundly this time.
11123222222111.title: The first night

111232222221111.content:
I woke up around 7:30 on Saturday. I was still a bit shaken by my dream, but I knew an easy way to clear my head. It was what I'd do before nearly every hockey game so I wouldn't think about what I was going to be doing later. I needed to go for a run. Probably a long one.

I got out of my pajamas, and changed into a white sports bra, and black compression shorts. Not wanting to attract to much attention by showing a lot of skin, I put on some long white running tights with black (horizontal) stripes that came down to my mid calf, and a light blue long sleeved shirt that had a hole in each sleeve where my thumbs were supposed to go. Then I did my best to put my hair into a ponytail, slid into one of the pairs of running shoes in my closet and headed down to the kitchen. Because nobody was up, I quietly made some toast and grabbed a protean bar to eat before I left. I was about to leave before I remembered I should take my phone and headphones to. I put my phone in a sleeve that go's on my arm and headed outside.

Once outside, I did some basic stretches ( http://www.pinterest.com/pin/23918343018... ). It was certainly different, due to my bodies new parts. Once I was done I was off. I went slow at first, just trying to grow more accustom to my body. The way certain parts moved when I ran, my endurance, things like that. After about twenty minutes, I had gone about 12 blocks and felt I could pick up the pace a little. Before I knew it, I was in a dead sprint headed away from my house. I slowed to a walk and checked the time on my phone. It was 8:10. I'd already been gone 30 minutes. And I was at least 22 or 23 blocks away from home.

"Time to go home" I said to myself.

It took about 25-ish minutes to get home. Once I got there I was able to quickly get inside without waking anyone up. I quietly made my way upstairs and to my bathroom, where I took my first shower as a girl. I didn't really want to wash, just rinse the sweat off. All in all, I was only showering for like 5 minutes.

Once I'd dried off, I walked back into my room to find a huge surprise. It was Taylor, my girlfriend turned boyfriend.

"Hey cutie" he said.

"Hey yourself" I replied. "What are you doing here"

"Well, I figured you would need some help getting dressed. So I came over to offer up my services"

"I think I'm capable of getting myself dressed" I said jokingly. Deep down, I was glad that Taylor was here, I just kinda wished that I'd asked her to be here rather than her assuming I was going to need her help.

"Well, I'll wait in the hall and be the judge of that" he said as he walked out of my room and closed the door.

With Taylor gone, I removed my towel and began getting dressed. I started with a simple, white, bra and panties set. Then I threw on a pair of dark blue jeans and a white tank top. And to finish it off, a pair of white ankle socks.

Satisfied with my work, I opened my door and asked Taylor "what do you think?"

"It's a good start, but you still got work to do"

"What do you mean?" I asked.

"Well, for starters, you could use a cardigan" she said as he pulled out a light brown one and handed it to me.

"Then you should have a belt. Not to hold up your pants, but as an accessory. Ah, here we go" he said as he handed me a brown belt.

"And given what you've already picked out, I'd say these boots would go great. But I'd recommend putting the boots over your pants"

Once I was all dressed I had these on ( http://www.polyvore.com/blues_browns/set... - minus the shades, necklace, earrings, and purse).

"Why all this" I asked.

"Simple really. When we go back to school, all the guys turned girls are going to have been helped with adjusting to being a girl by their girlfriends, moms, sisters, etcetera. They will look somewhat like they've adjusted to this. You've gotta do the same"

"I guess that makes sense" I said as I finished putting the boots on.

We went downstairs, where my mom turned dad was making pancakes. As I looked at the pile that was already finished, I noticed they had chocolate chips in them.

"Smells good Mr. Brown" Taylor said.

"Thank you Taylor. And my oh my, it looks like my new daughter is trying to stand out a little" dad said.

"Most of this was Taylor's idea" I said as I took a plate and placed 4 pancakes on it.

"Hey slow down there sweetie" my dad said.

"Why" I asked.

"Because girls generally aren't able to eat as much as a boy can. Turns out my dad was right as I barely finished what I had on my plate.

My first full day as a girl was nothing really special. We watched the news for a while before Taylor went home and I went upstairs to my room to play some video games. I eventually started to get ready for bed around 9:30. I put on a reddish-pink sports bra and some grey sweats. I had just finished when I heard my mom call me downstairs.

"What" I said as I got half way down the stairs.

"Honey. You dad and I just saw something on the news that we wanted to let you know about" my mom said.

"I'm listening" I said, a tad bit worried now.

"There appears to be a similar wave that hit yesterday going around the earth. Nobody's really sure what it's doing but it's expected to hit the California around midnight and have crossed the states by 3:00 in the morning" my dad said.

"We just wanted you to know that something may happen over night" mom said.

"Ok, thanks" I said. "Can I go to bed now, I'm kinda tired. Today was kinda long for me"

"Sure, you can go to bed sweetie" dad said.
111232222221111.title: The 1st full day

1112322222211111.content:
Lying in my bed just a few seconds later I started to think what my parents just have told, that something may happen overnight. What could it be?
Will I change my gender again, back to a boy?
1112322222211111.title: Continue

11123222222111111.content:
I couldn't sleep for most of that night. And I wasn't really sure why. Eventually, I passed out around 12:45 or so. But I was sure in for a surprise once I'd wake up on Sunday morning.



I woke up on Sunday morning a little off. I looked around my room, but it still looked the same as when I went to bed last night. As I began rolling out of bed, my phone went off. It was a text message from Taylor that read 'can u send me a pic of urself?'

'Why?' I asked back

'Because of the changes that happened last night' he said.

'Give me a minute'

As I walked into the bathroom, I still felt like something was off. But I still couldn't put my finger on it. It wasn't until I looked at the mirror that I realized what was wrong. For starters, my hair went from being dark brown to a dirty blonde. My breasts looked bigger. In fact, my overall body looked stronger and more athletic. Still in shock, I snapped a picture and sent it to Taylor ( https://thechive.files.wordpress.com/201... ).

Maybe a minute later, my phone got another text from Taylor that read 'wow, looks like ur going blonde now'

'What do u mean?' I asked.

'Can't u tell. Ur roots r blonde now so I bet u will be totally blonde by the end of the yr. don't worry, u won't lose any brain cells unless u start doing stupid stuff'

'Well thanks for the input. See u at school' I replied.

'See u'

As I set my phone down, my new dad opened my bathroom and said "there you are. We're going to be leaving for church in about an hour so you might want to think about getting dressed soon"

"I don't think I'm ready yet" I said.

"Well" he started, "just think of this as practice for school on Tuesday"

"Are you serious?" I said, astonished.

"I'm not saying you've got to wear a dress and heels yet, you'll do that once your ready. But just wear something that's not sweatpants and a sweatshirt"

"Like what?" I asked.

"Well" he said as he walked over towards my closet. "How's about this shirt, with this jacket" he paused for a moment. "And these leggings", another pause. "And maybe these shoes". As he walked out of my room, he said "oh, I won't expect you to wear makeup or jewelry as long as you don't want to"

'Good' I thought to myself, 'I don't want to wear any'. I looked at what he was handing me ( http://www.polyvore.com/principal_thing_... ). While I really didn't want to really dress like a girl at all, I didn't want to stand out either. Plus, it would be something I'd have to do in a few days. So I figured it would be best if I just bit the bullet and wore my first girly outfit.


***After Church***


Church wasn't much different from how it normally was before everyone changed genders. The only real difference was they had everyone wear a name tag so everyone knew who everyone was.

As for the clothes my mother turned father encouraged me to wear, they weren't actually that bad. The leggings were certainly different, as were the heels, but that was it really. Luckily my, dad, got helped me get ready early enough so I could get somewhat used to walking in the heels.

Once we'd gotten home, I changed into a pair of sweatpants and a looser fitting teeshirt. Once I was finished, I picked up my iPhone to find there was a message on it from my hockey coach. He (she now) wanted everyone to know we were holding an optional conditioning skate Monday at the normal time (meaning on the ice from 7:00pm to 8:00pm). While she wouldn't force anyone to attend, she strongly recommended it because it would be a good time to get used to being our new genders.

I texted a few of my teammates to see how they were doing and if they were going to the rink Monday. From what I gathered, most were going to go. When I got in touch with my best friend Chris, he sent me a picture of what he looked like now ( https://thechive.files.wordpress.com/201... ).
11123222222111111.title: change

111232222221111112.content:
Wow, Chris looked great, if I still were a guy I would certainly get hots for her, but now things are changed…Anyhow we will see each other on the skating trek tomorrow morning!
Before I went to bed I asked my parents if there was something in the news about another wave coming tonight, but they told there will no further wave expect to arrive within the next couple of days…
So I could sleep much better than yesterday, slowly getting used to my current body and the hair color!

Monday morning 6.00 PM: My alarm clock was giving the signal that is time to get up…
I crawled out of my bed slowly, still a little bit tired and opened my window to let in a little bit of good fresh morning air. I heard birds singing like usual and was wondering if they or animal also have been changing their gender?
Not finding an answer to this I went into the bathroom to have my morning routine. I was used to sit down for pee now, even not liking it and still missing my tool!
After a shower I went back into my room, I started to search for my ice skates. I found them; they are now typical white girl’s ice skating shoes. Guff, but at least they fit to my now my much smaller feet…
The ice hockey equipment was stored in school, so I only selected some jeans and sweater for the later school day and went down to have a breakfast. I need something to eat when I will have to train ice skating now…
After this I said good bye to my parents and jumped on my bike, which luckily was not much different to my usual one…But riding bike was not the same like before as a boy….Not having eggs and a schlong anymore is one thing, but getting the saddle touching you on a female groin is something I need to get used to…
I arrived at the ice skating track and saw my team mates….all girls now….
Wow not all were present but the ones I saw were mostly hot girls, with curves on the right places. Ok, some of the outfits they wearing were boyish, but Chris and I looked like we were adapting best to our new gender. Chris even was wearing some jeans, which were showing off her new great feminine shaped legs and butt…Also her top was emphasizing her cleavage. Wow I was wondering about our ice skating training session now…
111232222221111112.title: Monday morning

1112322222212.content: Let's make the girlfriend Version here...
1112322222212.title: Moving on

11123222222121.content:
The day started off like any other Friday had my whole life, and it was no different from any Friday this whole school year. I got up, got dressed, ate breakfast, packed my backpack and left for school. But then it happened. I was just starting my 2nd hour English class, not really paying attention to anyone or anything. Just sitting there with nothing on my mind, waiting for the day to be over, listening to the rain hit the roof of the building more than my teacher. I promised my boyfriend Mike to be around at the football stadium later, since it was the last home football game of the year, and since I was not seeing to much of his matches throughout the season I promised him to show up tonight!
I didn't know it at the time, but this football game was going to be delayed for a few weeks.

Now, they call what happened the gender wave. It caused a lot of panic and confusion for about a day or so before somehow people started accepting that this happened and moved on with their lives. For a while, ID's were pointless. People have named themselves vastly different names, but for the most part their middle names were their original names so people could still hang onto something from before the wave. One thing that was really different was the world of sports. While some sports remained male dominate like football, other sports had both male and female leagues. There was still typical leagues like the NBA and WNBA or MLB or NHL. But new leagues like the MLSB (Major League Softball) or the NWHL (National Women's Hockey League) were created so males turned females could still play pro sports while the females turned males took the spots in the old leagues.

Anyway, like i said nobody was excluded. One minute I'm feeling fine thinking it's just a normal Friday and the next I feel a funny tingling go all over my body and I blacked out for a minute. When I come to, I have short brown hair…
Looking down, I had now a flat chest with typical athletic male pecks…

11231111.content:
"You got a lot of carbon scoring here. It looks like you boys have seen a lot of action", said Luke as he was improving on his new Artoo units cosmetic appearence with a chrome pick. The other, an effeminate and fussy protocol droid, just took an oil bath in the nearby service tank.

C3PO, the latter droid, piped up. "With all we've been through, I'm suprised we're in as good condition as we are. What with the rebellion and all."

Luke suddenly ignored R2D2, the first droid, and turned to Threepio. "You know of the Rebellion against the Empire?"

"That's how we came to be in your service, if you take my meaning, sir."

"Have you been in many battles"? Luke asked this excitedly, as even the risk of death and mortal punishment was better than living on this one horse planet.

"Several, I think. Actually, there's not much to tell. I'm not much more than an interpreter, and not very good at telling stories."

Luke goes back to repairing the Artoo unit, who calls himself R2D2. He asks for his restraining bolt to be removed, which Luke happily obliges. He has to use a bigger pick, though.

"Well my friend", Luke says, "You've got something jammed in here real good. We're you on a Star Cruiser or..."

The restraining bolt loosened suddenly, which suprised Luke just a tickle, and suddenly a hologram appears from one of Artoo's lenses.

A pretty girl around Luke's age in a white tunic and wearing her brown hair in two buns was the object of the transmission.

"Help me Obi Wan Kenobi, you're my only hope" was her message.

"What's this?", asked Luke dumbly.

C3PO suddenly gives an accusing look at R2D2. "What is it?! He asked you a question...what is that?" Threepio directed Artoo's gaze at the hologram which was running on a continuous loop. Luke was transfixed by it.

Artoo makes some whistles and beeps which Luke could understand as nothing but an evasion of an answer.

Threepio translated it anyway: "Oh, he says it's nothing, sir. Merely a malfunction. Old data. Pay it no mind."

Luke was still intrigued. "Who is she? She's beautiful."

"I'm afraid I'm not quite sure, sir. I think she was a passenger on our last voyage. A person of some importance, I believe. Our captain was attached to..."

"Is there any more to this recording"? Luke reached out and touched Artoo, who then let off the mechanical equivelent of a shrill whine.

Threepio responded in kind. "Behave yourself Artoo, you're going to get us into trouble. It's all right, you can trust him. He's our new master."

Artoo whistles again, which Luke knew to be a sign of irritance.

"He says he's the property of an Obi Wan Kenobi, a resident of these parts. It's a private message for him. Quite frankly sir, I don't know what he's talking about. Our last master was Captain Antilles, but with what we've been through, this R2 unit has become a bit eccentric."

"Obi Wan Kenobi. I wonder if he means old Ben Kenobi"?

"I beg your pardon sir, but do you know what he's talking about?" asked Threepio to Luke.

"Well, I don't know anyone named Obi Wan, but Ben lives out beyond the Dune Sea. He's kind of a strange old hermit."

The hologram was still repeating itself, and Luke stopped thinking wistfully to himself and stared at the girl again.

Then he said, "It sounds like she's in trouble. I'd better play back the whole thing."

Artoo then beeps again. It seems to be in a hurry to go somewhere.

"He says the restraining bolt has short circuited his recording system. He says that if you remove the bolt, he may be able to play back the entire recording."

"Hmm? Oh, yeah, I guess you're too small to run away from me", says Luke to Artoo. He uses the pick he dropped and finally removed his bolt. "There you go."

The hologram then vanishes.

"Wait a minute, where'd she go? Play back the entire message!" shouted Luke to Artoo.

Artoo beeps again

"What message? The one you're carrying inside your rusty innards!" said Threepio. Luke thought they sounded like a comedy team, or worse, an old married couple. Ma and Pa Kettle of Pinnacle Farms.

Luke heard his Aunt Beru calling for him upstairs. "Luke! Luke! Come to dinner!"

"Alright, I'll be there in a few minutes!", shouted Luke to his aunt.


Before Luke reached the stairs though, he passed out.
